citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has 3 ringtail lemurs and the environmental enrichment plan was not available for inspection. A documented
non-human primate enrichment plan is imperative for all staff and volunteers to follow a set guidance for enrichment
approved by the attending veterinarian. Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow
an appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman
primates. The plan must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate
professional journals or reference guides, and as directed by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available
to APHIS upon request.
To be corrected by 4-10-23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility has 3 ringtail lemurs and the environmental enrichment plan was not available for inspection.  A documented 
non-human primate enrichment plan is imperative for all staff and volunteers to follow a set guidance for enrichment 
approved by the attending veterinarian.  Dealers, exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow 
an appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman 
primates. The plan must be in accordance with the currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate 
professional journals or reference guides, and as directed by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available 
to APHIS upon request. 
 
To be corrected by 4-10-23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative. 
 
End Section
